name: Path T
title: Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  The intrinsic muscles of tongue are four paired muscles within the tongue which control its shape.  The extrinsic muscles originate from structures outside the tongue and control its positioning.

**Note 2:**  TNM does not include a Tis or TX category for melanoma of mucosa of head and neck sites. Tis and TX are mapped to NA and TNM stage group is derived as NA.

**Note 3:**  TNM does not include a T1 or T2 category for mucosal melanoma of head and neck sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T3 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 5:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other
rows:
In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa

    Base of tongue (posterior one-third of tongue):
